title: Privacy-First Analytics: The Smart Choice for Startup Founders

sections.heading: Why Privacy-First Analytics Matter
bullets: Build customer trust from day one with transparent data practices
Comply with GDPR, CCPA, and emerging privacy regulations worldwide
Reduce legal risks and potential fines from data mishandling
Differentiate your startup with ethical data collection practices

sections.heading: Key Benefits for Growing Startups
bullets: Get actionable insights without compromising user privacy
No credit card required to start tracking your key metrics
Free trial includes full access to advanced analytics features
Scale your data collection as your startup grows

sections.heading: Getting Started
bullets: Set up privacy-first tracking in under 10 minutes
Configure custom events that matter to your business
Create dashboards that focus on growth metrics
Invite your team to collaborate on data insights
